author: Peter Goff
title: Coronavirus: First mainland Chinese city bans sale of dog and cat meat
description: Shenzhen has become the first mainland Chinese city to ban the sale and consumption of dog and cat meat, following a move by Beijing to prohibit the wildlife trade after the coronavirus outbreak was linked to a Wuhan market selling a range of wild animals. In…
content:
Shenzhen has become the first mainland Chinese city to ban the sale and consumption of dog and cat meat, following a move by Beijing to prohibit the wildlife trade after the coronavirus outbreak was linked to a Wuhan market selling a range of wild animals.
